STATIC_heading.text: ABBREVIATIONS

STATIC_table.text:
AFPalpha-fetoprotein

IGRT

 

intensity-modulated gated radiation therapy—use of imaging mechanism attached to linear accelerator is added to IMRT to gate (track) a tumor moving during respiration

bcrbreakpoint cluster region (bcr-abl oncogene is a part of the Philadelphia chromosome associated with chronic myeloid leukemia)IHCimmunohistochemistry
BMTbone marrow transplantationIMRTintensity-modulated radiation therapy— high doses of radiation are delivered directly to cancer cells in a targeted way, more precisely than in conventional radiotherapy
bxbiopsyIOImmuno-oncology
CAcancerIORTintraoperative radiation therapy
CAR T-cellchimeric antigen receptor T cellMetsmetastases
CEAcarcinoembryonic antigenmAb (MAB)monoclonal antibody; -mab indicates that a drug is a monoclonal antibody
cGycentigray (one hundredth of a gray) or radNEDno evidence of disease
chemochemotherapyNFneurofibromatosis
CRcomplete response—disappearance of all tumorNHLnon-Hodgkin lymphoma
CSFcolony-stimulating factor—examples: G-CSF (granulocyte colony-stimulating factor) and GM-CSF (granulocytemacrophage colony-stimulating factor)NSCLCnon–small cell lung cancer
DNAdeoxyribonucleic acidPap smearPapanicolaou smear
EGFRepidermal growth factor receptorPDprogressive disease—tumor increases in size
ERestrogen receptorPRpartial response—tumor is one-half its original size
EPOerythropoietin; promotes growth of red blood cellsprot.protocol
FNAfine needle aspirationPSAprostate-specific antigen
5-FU5-fluorouracilPSCTperipheral stem cell transplantation
GagalliumPSRSproton stereotactic radiosurgery
GISTgastrointestinal stromal tumorRNAribonucleic acid
Gygray—unit of absorbed radiation doseRTradiation therapy
H&Ehematoxylin and eosin—a dye combination used to stain pathology specimensSDstable disease—tumor does not shrink but does not grow
HER2growth factor gene highly activated in cells of certain types of breast cancerTNMtumor-node-metastasis
  VEGFvascular endothelial growth factor
  RT, XRTradiation therapy
